pkgmetadata.longdescription:
Configuration for webserving Jitsi Meet.
This package contains configuration for Nginx and Apache webservers, allowing them to distribute the Jitsi Meet WebRTC, JavaScript/WASM-based videoconferencing client.
Weekly renewal checks for Let's Encrypt TLS certicates are also configured (via certbot) where required.

use.flag: Use systemd timers for certbot renewal, rather than cron
